short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmarks and history, tabbed for your pleasure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabMarks is a new tab extension that makes it fast and easy to search through your bookmarks and history. 

Unlike other extensions that just show a picture or the weather in a new tab, instead make opening a new tab useful with searchable bookmarks.

After opening a new tab, just click a folder from the top area to see all the links below, or type a few letters in the search to quickly filter through your bookmarks or web history.

The toolbar popup is a quick way to add a bookmark for the current tab, making it easy to change the title or address, select an existing folder or create a new folder. 

You can change the theme from Grey, Sky, Haze, Moon, Olive, Mud, Ocean, Forest, Dusk, or Midnight. Or switch the style between Flat or Shadow.
